          <title>
            <string language="en">The carbon element</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Carbonelement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'élément de carbone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O elemento do carbono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'elemento del carbonio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το στοιχείο άνθρακα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El elemento del carbón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that only carbon atoms make up the element carbon.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemicals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß nur Kohlenstoffatome 
den Elementcarbon bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que seulement les 
atomes de carbone composent le carbone d'élément.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que somente os átomos 
de carbono fazem acima o carbono do elemento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che soltanto gli 
atomi di carbonio compongono il carbonio dell'elemento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι μόνο τα άτομα άνθρακα
αποτελούν τον άνθρακα στοιχείων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que solamente los 
átomos de carbón hacen para arriba el carbón del elemento.</string>
          </description>
